Title: Bangladesh’s RPGCL seeks two June LNG cargoes through two tenders
Description: Bangladesh’s state-owned Rupantarita Prakritik Gas Co. (RPGCL) has issued two tenders seeking one cargo each for delivery on June 4-5 and 11-12 to either the Moheshkhali LNG or Summit LNG import terminals in Chittagong.
Author: CK
